description: These meaty, succulent burgers are always a crowd pleaser at a BBQ or for game day.
keywords: Beef burger,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Peanut free
name: Beef Burger On A Seeded Bun with Lettuce, Tomato & Onion Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Add the canola oil to a heated pan. Add the diced onions and garlic and fry for 2 minutes while tossing.
Remove from the heat and empty contents to a mixing bowl. Add the mince, herbs, egg and breadcrumbs to the bowl and combine fully.
Once the mix is combined fully, pack the mince into into 4 patties. Chargrill the burgers for 5 minutes on each side.
Heat your buns up on the chargrill also if desired. Serve the burgers on the buns with brie, lettuce, tomato and ketchup.
